mapper.insert: insert into music (mid, mname, sid, count, type, myear, mimg, location, aid, mvid, duration, state, discuss, mreserve1, mreserve2, mreserve3 ) values (#{mid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{myear,jdbcType=DATE}, #{mimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mvid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{duration,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{discuss,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mreserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mreserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mreserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update music set mname = #{mname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sid = #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, count = #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, myear = #{myear,jdbcType=DATE}, mimg = #{mimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, location = #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, aid = #{aid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mvid = #{mvid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, duration = #{duration,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, discuss = #{discuss,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mreserve1 = #{mreserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mreserve2 = #{mreserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mreserve3 = #{mreserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where mid = #{mid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select mid, mname, sid, count, type, myear, mimg, location, aid, mvid, duration, state, discuss, mreserve1, mreserve2, mreserve3 from music where mid = #{mid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select mid, mname, sid, count, type, myear, mimg, location, aid, mvid, duration, state, discuss, mreserve1, mreserve2, mreserve3 from music
select count(*) musicCount from music where music.sid=#{mid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select mid, mname, sid, count, type, myear, mimg, location, aid, mvid, duration, state, discuss, mreserve1, mreserve2, mreserve3 musicCount from music where music.sid=#{mid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
